SEARCH
Package data

Class OfficerApplicationDatabase

java.lang.Object
data.OfficerApplicationDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database, FilePath
public class OfficerApplicationDatabase extends Object implements FilePath, Database
Provides methods for interacting with the officer application database. Includes functionality to read, update, and write officer applications to a file-based database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface util.FilePath

    enquiryDatabaseFilePath, filePath, loginFilePath, officerApplicationDatabaseFilePath, projectApplicationDatabaseFilePath, projectDatabaseFilePath, userDatabaseFilePath

    • readApplication

      public static List<OfficerApplication> readApplication()
      Reads all officer applications from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all officer applications.

    • updateApplication

      public static void updateApplication(OfficerApplication application)

      Parameters:
      application - The officer application to be updated.

    • writeApplication

    • getApplicationByApplicantId

      public static OfficerApplication getApplicationByApplicantId(String applicantId)
      Retrieves a single officer application by the applicant's ID.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant whose application is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The officer application corresponding to the specified applicant ID, or null if not found.

    • getApplicationsByApplicantId

      public static List<OfficerApplication> getApplicationsByApplicantId(String applicantId)
      Retrieves a list of officer applications by the applicant's ID.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant whose applications are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of officer applications for the specified applicant ID.

    • getApplicationByProjectName

      public OfficerApplication getApplicationByProjectName(String projectName)
      Retrieves a single officer application by the project name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name whose officer application is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The officer application corresponding to the specified project name, or null if not found.
